articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Asia markets set to rise as China factory activity assessed; Japan business sentiment on deck - CNBC
articles.description: China released its official PMI figures over the weekend, while Japan is set to release its Tankan survey, which gauges business sentiment in the country.
articles.content:
Asia-Pacific markets climbed Monday as investors assessed China's business activity for February.
China's National Bureau of Statistics data showed that manufacturing activity expanded in March, wit… [+1387 chars]

articles.author: Toby Alder
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for April 1 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian shares mostly rose as US inflation figures reaffirmed bets for the Federal Reserve to ease policy this year and China’s economic recovery gained momentum.
articles.content:
Asian shares mostly rose as US inflation figures reaffirmed bets for the Federal Reserve to ease policy this year and Chinas economic recovery gained momentum.
